TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AnnotationHelper extends System.Object
public ref class AnnotationHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供公用程式方法和命令，以建立及刪除反白顯示、筆墨/筆跡自黏便箋，以及文字自黏便箋附註。

span.span: Provides utility methods and commands to create and delete highlight, ink sticky note, and text sticky note annotations.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ClearHighlightsForSelection (System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService service);
.method public static hidebysig void ClearHighlightsForSelection(class System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService service) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ClearHighlightsForSelection (service As AnnotationService)
public: static void ClearHighlightsForSelection(System::Windows::Annotations::AnnotationService ^ service);
static member ClearHighlightsForSelection : System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService -> unit

param.name: service
param.span: 附註服務，會從中移除反白顯示附註。

span.span: The annotation service from which to remove highlight annotations.

summary.span: 從與特定 關聯之檢視器控制項的目前選取範圍中清除所有的反白顯示附註。

span.span: Clears all highlight annotations from the current selection of the viewer control associated with the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的檢視器選取範圍的長度為零，或不會重疊任何註解的重點提示、會執行任何作業。If the current viewer selection is zero length or does not overlap any annotation highlights, performs no operation. 如果目前的檢視器選取項目僅提供部分重疊反白顯示，只選取項目重疊的部分會清除，且會維持反白顯示的註釋的取消選取的部分。If the current viewer selection overlaps a highlight only partially, only the portion of the selection that overlaps is cleared and the unselected portion of the annotation highlight remains.

span.span: is .
is not enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation CreateHighlightForSelection (System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService service, string author, System.Windows.Media.Brush highlightBrush);

static member CreateHighlightForSelection : System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService * string * System.Windows.Media.Brush -> System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation

param.name: service
param.span: 附註服務可用來建立反白顯示附註。

span.span: The annotation service to use to create the highlight annotation.
The author of the annotation.

param.name: highlightBrush
param.span: 用來在選取的內容上繪製反白顯示的筆刷。

span.span: The brush to use to draw the highlight over the selected content.

summary.span: 在與指定 關聯之檢視器控制項的目前選取範圍上建立反白顯示附註。

span.span: Creates a highlight annotation on the current selection of the viewer control associated with the specified .

returns.span: 反白顯示附註；如果沒有選取的內容可繪製反白顯示則為 。

span.span: The highlight annotation; or , if there is no selected content to highlight.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 反白顯示註釋錨定至的目前選取範圍所定義的內容， ， ， ，或來指定控制項建構函式。The highlight annotation is anchored to the content defined by the current selection of the , , , , or control specified to the constructor. 如果沒有選取的內容 （選取項目長度為零長度），會建立任何註釋和就會擲回。If there is no selected content (the selection length is zero length), no annotation is created and an is thrown. `author` 可以指定為`null`沒有作者定義在此情況下。`author` can be specified as `null` in which case no author is defined. 如果`highlightBrush`已`null`，預設的反白顯示所指定的註解的筆刷`service`用。If `highlightBrush` is `null`, the default highlight brush of the given annotation `service` is used. 指定的註釋`service`必須能夠透過呼叫才能呼叫。The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to prior to calling .

span.span: is .
is not enabled.
-or-
in not a .

exception.span: 檢視器控制項內不含內容選取範圍。

span.span: The viewer control contains no content selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 筆跡自黏便箋註釋錨定至的目前選取範圍所定義的內容， ， ， ，或來指定控制項建構函式。The ink sticky note annotation is anchored to the content defined by the current selection of the , , , , or control specified to the constructor. 如果沒有使用者選取的內容 （選取項目長度為零長度），會建立任何註釋和就會擲回。If there is no user-selected content (the selection length is zero length), no annotation is created and an is thrown. `author` 可以指定為`null`沒有作者定義在此情況下。`author` can be specified as `null` in which case no author is defined. 指定的註釋`service`必須能夠透過呼叫才能呼叫。The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to prior to calling .

param.name: service
param.span: 要刪除筆墨/筆跡自黏便箋附註的附註服務。

span.span: The annotation service from which to delete ink sticky note annotations.

summary.span: 刪除筆墨/筆跡自黏便箋附註，這個附註完全包含在與指定 相關之檢視器控制項的目前選取範圍。

span.span: Deletes ink sticky note annotations that are wholly contained within the current selection of the viewer control associated with the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果檢視器控制項相關聯不包含任何使用者選取項目或使用者選取項目完全沒有任何筆跡自黏便箋註釋，會執行任何作業。If the viewer control associated with the contains no user selection or the user selection does not wholly contain any ink sticky note annotations, performs no operation. 指定的註釋`service`必須能夠透過呼叫才能呼叫。The given annotation `service` must be enabled by means of a call to prior to calling .

span.span: is .
is not enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo GetAnchorInfo (System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService service, System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation annotation);

param.name: service
param.span: 用於這個作業的附註服務。

span.span: The annotation service to use for this operation.

param.name: annotation
param.span: 要取得相關錨定資訊的附註。

span.span: The annotation to get anchoring information for.

summary.span: 傳回 物件，這個物件提供有關指定之附註的錨定資訊，例如錨定位置。

span.span: Returns an object that provides anchoring information, such as the anchor location, about the specified annotation.

returns.span: 物件，提供有關指定之附註的錨定資訊，如果無法解析物件，則為 。

span.span: An object that provides anchoring information about the specified annotation, or if it cannot be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Examples 請考慮具有註解窗格的簡單文件讀取器應用程式。Consider a simple document reader application that has a comments pane. 註解窗格可能是清單方塊，其中顯示來自錨定到文件之註釋清單的文字。The comments pane might be a list box that displays the text from a list of annotations that are anchored to a document. 如果使用者在清單方塊中選取項目，則應用程式會將對應註釋物件所錨定之文件中的段落帶入檢視。If the user selects an item in the list box, then the application brings into view the paragraph in the document that the corresponding annotation object is anchored to. 下列範例示範如何為這類作為註解窗格的清單方塊實作事件處理常式。The following example demonstrates how to implement the event handler of such a list box that serves as the comments pane. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer#Handler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#handler)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer#Handler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentAnnotatedViewer/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#handler)]
